heading: HR00777
0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE FAILURE OF VARIOUS SOCIAL MEDIA NETWORKS TO PROVIDE AN EFFECTIVE METHOD OR SYSTEM TO ASCERTAIN THE AUTHENTICITY OF ACCOUNTS REGISTERED WITH THEM, LEADING TO PREVALENCE OF FAKE, MALICIOUS, AND SPURIOUS SOCIAL MEDIA ACCOUNTS, WHICH RESULTS TO UNCHECKED AND RAMPANT ACTS OF ONLINE IDENTITY THEFT
status: Referred to the Technical Working Group (TWG) on 2018-12-11
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00777
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE FAILURE OF VARIOUS SOCIAL MEDIA NETWORKS TO PROVIDE AN EFFECTIVE METHOD OR SYSTEM TO ASCERTAIN THE AUTHENTICITY OF ACCOUNTS REGISTERED WITH THEM, LEADING TO PREVALENCE OF FAKE, MALICIOUS, AND SPURIOUS SOCIAL MEDIA ACCOUNTS, WHICH RESULTS TO UNCHECKED AND RAMPANT ACTS OF ONLINE IDENTITY THEFT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALVAREZ, PANTALEON D.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-13
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Belaro (002 2017-07-25)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for Meeting/Hearing on 2017-05-23
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-12-11
          -To strengthen the bill, the Committee approved the creation of a Technical Working Group (TWG) to further study the bill.
      3. Referred to the Technical Working Group (TWG) on 2018-12-11
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY ON 2017-03-07
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-02-20;
